Header: Dumpingof garbage at the Haputale Tangalle Forest Reserve causes serious environmental damage
Content: The dumping of garbage at the Haputale Tangalle Forest Reserve which has attracted both local and foreign tourists, is causing serious environmental damage. Residents of the area point out that the garbage is dumped at the Tangalle Reserve by people who visit it. This forest reserve is rich in small streams, with a variety of flora and fauna. Some people who visit the location to enjoy the beauty of the place throw away bottles, cups and polythene in such a way as to damage the ecosystem. Residents of the area say that the Tangalle Reserve should be safeguarded through a proper disposal system.
